snippet: The measures direct the New York State Health Department to form a program creating an “expedited pathway” to patients whose lack of access to the drug could harm them.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo signs two bills that will create emergency medical marijuana program, accelerating distribution of drug for medical purposes ahead of implementation of statewide program by two months.
lead_paragraph: The measures direct the New York State Health Department to form a program creating an “expedited pathway” to patients whose lack of access to the drug could harm them.

headline.main: Cuomo Signs 2 Bills to Speed Up Medical Marijuana Distribution
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Signs 2 Bills to Speed Up Medical Marijuana Distribution to Sickest Patients
